channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2024101522
item.description:
Report X-2024101522

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-25T09:22:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-15
  • City: PRESCOTT
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 6 lithium ion battery powered walkie talkie radios discovered inside fibreboard outer package. radios were powered on. no dg markings on outer packaging. secured onsite for FAA inspection.

item.title: Report X-2024101278
item.description:
Report X-2024101278

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-21T12:23:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-12
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RECIEVED CALL ABOUT A LEAKING HAZMAT ON THE IR4 BELT LINE. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE WITH FULL PPE AND FOLLOWED APPROPRIATE STEPS TO SAFELY AND PROPERLY CONTAINT THE HAZMAT. ONCE INSIDE THE LINED SPILL TRAY, THEY BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE PSC FOR PROPER DISPOSAL PROCEDURES.
